Title: In Heat
Writer: Naomi Ekperigin (staff writer), Ilana Glazer (created by), Ilana Glazer, Abbi Jacobson (created by), Abbi Jacobson, Anthony King (staff writer), Jen Statsky (staff writer)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, John Gemberling, Hannibal Buress
Plot: Ilana hunts for the perfect last-minute gift for Lincoln while Abbi tries to track down an AC to keep cool in the bedroom.
